revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 23:;Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion, obols 28;;Horion, son of Onnophris, grandson of Horos, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Ptollas, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora, drachmas 8;;Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 40, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 22 likewise:;Pasoxis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Panther, mother Taseus, drachmas 8, obols 28;;Heron, son of Horos, grandson of Petheus, mother Taharpagathes, drachmas 20;;Papeeis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, obols 28;;in total for the day drachmas 40, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 23 likewise:;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 4;;Didymos, son of Heron, grandson of Heras, mother Tasiepis, drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Achillas, grandson of Kastor, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Herieus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tlemenesis, drachmas 4;;Polydeukes, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapasion, drachmas 4;;Apynchis, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 28;;(Mecheir) 24 likewise:;Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Menches, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Pasion, son of Petsiris, grandson of Pasion, mother Thases, drachmas 20;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Satabous, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tahorion, obols 28;;12th year, Horion, son of Mysthes, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Thermouthis ? copper drachmas;;Herakleides, son of Abykis, grandson of Abykis, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Mysthes, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthos, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;Herakles, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Valerius, fatherless, mother Valeria, drachmas 8;;Chairemon, son of Horos, grandson of Onnophris, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Horos, son, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Leonides, grandson of Papeis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 20;;in total for the day drachmas 100, obols 19 of which for the 12th year obols 20;;12th year Harpagathes, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Tasiaipis, drachmas 8;;Harpagathes, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pekmeis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Horion, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Abykis, son of Demas, grandson of Abykis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Pakysis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamaron, drachmas 4;;Charidemos, son of Petoraipis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Neilos, son of Euhemeros, grandson of Neilos, mother Sambous, drachmas 4, obols 27;;in total for the day drachmas 40, obols 26 of which for the 12th year drachmas 8;;(Mecheir) 26:;Petaus, son of Petalos, grandson of Petaus, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 8;;Kastresis, slave of Thasarion alias Nebsosis, drachmas 8;;Sokmenis, son of Apynchis, grandson of Sambas, mother Thatres, drachmas 16."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
